be.ac.ulb.infof307.g06.presentation.manageproject.editing

Class EditingController

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g06.presentation.manageproject.editing.EditingController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConsoleControllerListener, DrawingControllerListener, MenuBarEditingControllerListener, ToolBarControllerListener, RevertControllerListener

    public class EditingController
extends java.lang.Object
implements MenuBarEditingControllerListener, ToolBarControllerListener, DrawingControllerListener, ConsoleControllerListener, RevertControllerListener
    Class combining every tool needed in Project edition
